name: An Endless Runner
description:
Join Johnny Jones, the endless runner veteran in the exploration of the famous Jungle Temple! Collect coins, avoid traps, and run as fast as you can, because this might just be the adventure of your life. ;)

The prototype of this game was made for the June installment of the One Game a Month game jam series in 2021 (Havi Egy Játék in Hungarian; https://www.facebook.com/groups/HEJ.Budapest). The theme of the jam was: It Shouldn't Be Doing That.

Controls:

  • Movement: A-D or Left-Right arrows
  • Menu: Escape
